title: Dodgers' open house to showcase mini-plans
body: LOS ANGELES -- The Dodgers will hold an open house on Saturday from 10 a.m. to 3 p.m. PT for potential buyers of mini-plans. Among the options are a 20-game plan that includes Opening Day, a complete set of 10 bobblehead games and the new set of eight collectors' pins. Additionally, there is a 30-game Pick 'Em plan allowing purchasers to pick 30 or more games. Additional open houses are scheduled for Saturday, Feb. 7, and Saturday, Feb. 21. Attendees are requested to enter Dodger Stadium through the Elysian Park Avenue Gate A entrance and follow the signs to parking lot D, then enter the stadium through the front-office entrance. Club staff members will then provide seat tours. Ken Gurnick is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Ken Gurnick
